name: Ahmed Kazmi - Lost In Your Eyes

metadata.description:
Ahmed’s musical beginnings were simple, starting with an acoustic guitar and any place to write his thoughts. He is a multifaceted talent with a palette of different creative crafts, being well-versed as a vocalist, producer, musician, songwriter, and audio engineer. He releases original music as part of OK! (@findokmusic), a musical duo as well as an individual artist. Ahmed seamlessly blends his skillset with sound to craft captivating alternative-pop, R&B, and electronic compositions. He infuses his music with the rich cultural influences of his South Asian heritage, adding a worldly touch that sets his sound apart.

This song is about being drawn to someone or something even though it may not be the best choice for oneself. This may not mean the situation is necessarily bad, but more so speaks to the part of you that knows it isn’t exactly the best thing for you. Experiencing this blissful feeling can be conflicting because deep down you are aware that it is not a sustainable situation. It also may not always feel like it makes sense to challenge this feeling, especially when it provides momentary joy, peace, and happiness. But sometimes we get lost within someone or something and fall in love with comfortability rather than the thing itself.

lyrics.text:
Locks and doors 
Wanting more… 
Dynamites 
Blow through walls
I’m not sure 
But I know 
Standing by…

And so I try to 
push - away 
I can - not stay, 
no no, 
And when 
I get away  
Ya gravity
Gets hold on me 
And the more 
I try - to fight 
I can’t seem to win 
Feelings so strong…

The more that I stare 
The more I’m lost in your eyes
The more that I stare 
The more you stuck on my mind
The more that I stare 
In your eyes
I got you
On my mind
The more that I stare 
I get lost in your eyes 
I get lost in your eyes 
I get lost in your eyes 

Eyes…
Eyes… 
The Monte cristo it’s burnin slow
Slow dancing with no dance floor
We both alone so you know we staying close

When I try to 
push - away 
I can - not stay, 
no no, 
And so 
I get away  
But gravity
Got hold on me 
And the more 
I try - to fight 
I can’t seem to win 
Feelings so strong…

metadata.name: Lost In Your Eyes #1
metadata.title: Lost In Your Eyes
